svcproc.title: Valve Lash for Intake and Exhaust Valves
svcproc.para: During the procedure to adjust valve lash, the crankshaft is rotated two times:

item.para: Six adjustments are made when piston 1 is at Top Dead Center (TDC) compression.
Six adjustments are made when piston 6 is at Top Dead Center (TDC) compression.

svcproc.para: If the engine is equipped with the Diamond Logic™ engine brake, corresponding brake actuator lash can be adjusted before and after rotating the crankshaft the second time.
